yeah this has really good quality video, but the subs are lacking. the subs suggested by alpha 1 are great

Dunno why everyone's saying the video was great on this.  Using Videolan the AR on this was awful, leading to low video quality. I played around with settings and lost half the film experience because I couldn't get it right.  

The replacement subs were pretty awful too.  Loads of Bahasa vocabulary which was untranslated.  Looked like the translator struggled with concepts and just gave up and left the original words in.

The subs aren't the best but a very good effort made. Besides, it's worth learning the language for this one!

 Thank you uploader!
V-10

Movie- 10
